column2:
"/mn15 /ci2 1 Heheheh... In the end, you're forced to beg for my aid... Very well.
Behold the power of the Black Wolf!"
"/mn15 /ci2 1 Hmph... Spare me your pathetic delusions of \"friendship\". An enemy stood before me, and I crushed it, as I would any other."

"/mn2 Darkness reclaims me...
This is the fate of the 《Phantom》..."

"/mn2 You fell because you lack the will to do what must be done. However...
A 《Phantom》 has no such inhibitions!"
